snippet.title: HypeSquad - Exclusive Gameplay Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Here's a gameplay trailer for Hypesquad, a new third-person arena combat game.

HypeSquad takes elements from your favorite hero shooters, third-person shooters, and multiplayer games to make something new and exciting. Choose from a selection of colorful characters and engage in combat up close or from a distance. A new Hype Squad alpha test starts on June 13th on Steam, so get ready to hop in and knock some heads.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
